SELECT script_test_sq.nextval FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO script_test VALUES (TO_NUMBER(#{scriptTestSq}), #{scriptTestScore}, #{performScript}, sysdate, #{memId}, #{scriptSq})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SCRIPT_TEST A, SCRIPT B, SCRIPT_GB C WHERE A.MEM_ID = #{memId} AND A.SCRIPT_SQ = B.SCRIPT_SQ AND B.SCRIPT_GB_SQ = C.SCRIPT_GB_SQ

SELECT DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY totCnt DESC) as Rank, d.* FROM (SELECT c.script_sq, c.script_content, count(*) AS totCnt FROM (SELECT a.script_test_sq, a.script_test_score, a.script_sq, b.script_content, b.script_gb_sq, a.script_test_date FROM script_test a, script b WHERE a.script_sq = b.script_sq AND b.script_gb_sq = #{scriptGbSq} AND a.script_test_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate})c GROUP BY c.script_sq, c.script_content, c.script_gb_sq ORDER BY totCnt DESC) d

SELECT c.script_test_score, c.script_sq, c.script_test_date, count(c.scoreCnt) as totCnt FROM (SELECT a.script_test_sq, a.script_test_score, a.script_sq, b.script_content, b.script_gb_sq, a.script_test_date, count(*) as scoreCnt FROM script_test a, script b WHERE a.script_sq = b.script_sq AND b.script_gb_sq = #{scriptGbSq} AND a.script_test_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY a.script_test_sq, a.script_test_score, a.script_sq, b.script_content, b.script_gb_sq, a.script_test_date) c GROUP BY c.script_test_score, c.script_sq, c.script_content, c.script_test_date, c.scoreCnt ORDER BY c.script_test_score DESC, c.script_test_date DESC
